title: Nazotoki Hakase No Hirameki Iseki Tankenki
alternative_title: ナゾトキ博士のヒラメキ遺跡探検記 ; The Puzzle-Solving Professor's 'Eureka' Adventures
status: ナゾトキ博士のヒラメキ遺跡探検記 ; The Puzzle-Solving Professor's 'Eureka' Adventures
description:
Description :
        Follow Professor Nazotoki and his trusty assistant, Kaito-kun, as they endeavor to solve the mysteries laid to rest beneath the eternal sands of ancient ruins! Join in this interactive puzzle-solving adventure to guide the savant Professor and his sidekick--after all, together, there's nothing they can't understand!
